body_html:
From what it looks like, you have cuda 7.5 installed. If you are trying to use prebuilt tensorflow pip packages, we build these against cuda 8.0.

So you either need to upgrade cuda, or install from sources.
body_text:
From what it looks like, you have cuda 7.5 installed. If you are trying to use prebuilt tensorflow pip packages, we build these against cuda 8.0.
So you either need to upgrade cuda, or install from sources.
body:
From what it looks like, you have cuda 7.5 installed. If you are trying to use prebuilt tensorflow pip packages, we build these against cuda 8.0.

So you either need to upgrade cuda, or install from sources.
